quotes.text: To all the living there is hope, for a living dog is better than a dead lion. Ecclesiastes 9:4

quotes.text: Hope is the foundation of patience.

quotes.text: When hope animates us there is a vigour in the whole body.

quotes.text: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment.

quotes.text: Hope teaches endurance and an eager anticipation of that which will become reality. Simon J.

quotes.text: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore. William

quotes.text: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, '"What are you doing for others?" Martin Luther King,

quotes.text: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.

quotes.text: Life is so short. I would rather sing one song than interpret the thousand. Jack London The first half of life is devoted to forming a healthy ego, the second half is going inward and letting go of One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love. Sophocles
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The loneliest place in the world is the human heart when love is absent.

quotes.text: Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.

quotes.text: First and foremost, self -love, and then give love away.

quotes.text: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.text: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
quotes.author: Ray Goforth

quotes.text: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.text: Success is not built on success. It’s built on failure. It’s built on frustration.
quotes.author: Sometimes it is built on catastrophe.  Summer Redstone

quotes.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.text: Follow effective actions with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect. Ralph Waldo Emerson Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: To be successful you need friends and to be very successful you need enemies.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.text: I can’t give you a sure -fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
quotes.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

quotes.text: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: The men who try to do something and fail are infinitely better than those who try to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.author: Lloyd Jones

quotes.text: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness that any other.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well. John D. Rockefeller
quotes.author: Jr.

quotes.text: Just don’t give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.text: I can’t imagine a person becoming a success who doesn’t give this game of life everything he’s got.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.text: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn’t guarantee success, but without it you don’t have a chance.
quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

quotes.text: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven’t planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.text: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.text: Coming together is a beginning, keeping together is progress, working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.text: The people who succeed are irrationally passionate about something.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.text: You’ve achieved success in your field when you don’t know whether what you’re doing is work or play.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.text: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.text: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: 90% of your plans are going to fail no matter what you do. Get used to it.
quotes.author: Mark Manson

quotes.text: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
quotes.author: Vaibhav Shah

quotes.text: In one minute you can change your attitude and in that minute you can change your entire day.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.text: You have reached the pinnacle of success as soon as you become uninterested in money, compliments, or publicity.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.text: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.text: If you work just for money, you’ll never make it, but if you love what you’re doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.text: The difference between successful people and very successful people is that very successful people say ‘no’ to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.text: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.text: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember –the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.text: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: You’re not obligated to win. You’re obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.text: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.text: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough – when they are on the very brink of success.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: If you care about what you do and work hard at it, there isn't anything you can't do if you want to.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.text: If you don’t value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents. Value what you know and start charging for it.
quotes.author: Kim Garst

quotes.text: I don’t dwell on success. Maybe that’s one reason I’m successful.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets. Steve Maraboli Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.text: There are no permanent changes because change itself is permanent.
quotes.author: Ralph L. Woods

quotes.text: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to change often.  John Henry Cardinal
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.text: Life is about change. Sometimes it’s painful. Sometimes it’s beautiful. But most of the time, it’s both.
quotes.author: Lana Lang

quotes.text: They must change often, who would be constant in happiness.  Confucius
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: One must never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.text: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The art of life lies in a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakura

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I’ve learned that you’ll never be disappointed if you always keep an eye on uncharted territory, where you’ll be challenged and growing and having fun.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.text: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.text: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.   Socrates
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Let him that would move the world first move himself.  Socrates
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.text: We change, whether we like it or not.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: The one unchangeable certainty is that nothing is certain or unchangeable.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: One day spent with someone you love can change everything.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.text: The price of doing the same old thing is far higher than the price of change.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.text: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: No matter how far you have gone on a wrong road, turn back.
quotes.author: Turkish proverb

quotes.text: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.text: It’s okay to be scared. Being scared means you’re about to do something really, really brave.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.text: Because things are the way they are, things will not stay the way they are.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.text: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy, for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter into another.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Stepping onto a brand -new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation, which is not nurturing to the whole woman.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.author: Anthony D’Angelo

quotes.text: Life will only change when you become more committed to your dreams than you are to your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Billy Cox

quotes.text: Life is measured by the rapidity of change, the succession of influences that modify the being.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: All is change; all yields its place and goes.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: Those who expect moments of change to be comfortable and free of conflict have not learned their history.
quotes.author: Joan Wallach Scott

quotes.text: When you’re through changing, you’re through.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.text: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.text: When it feels scary to jump, that’s exactly WHEN you jump. Otherwise you end up staying in the same place your whole life. And that I can’t do.
quotes.author: Oscar Isaacs

quotes.text: Everything flows, nothing stays still.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: It is changing that things find purpose.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change, and to preserve change amid order.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.text: Change is the law of life, and those who look only to the past and present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Change is inevitable in a progressive society. Change is constant.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don’t resist them; that only creates sorrow.
quotes.author: Let reality be reality.  Lao Tzu

quotes.text: In embracing Change, entrepreneurs ensure social and economic stability.
quotes.author: George Gilder

quotes.text: You must change in order to survive.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.text: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.text: Change does not change tradition. It strengthens it. Change is a challenge and an opportunity, not a threat.
quotes.author: Prince Philip of England

quotes.text: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: For many men, the acquisition of wealth does not end their troubles, it only changes them.
quotes.author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don’t.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Change is the only evidence of life.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.text: Your desire to change must be greater than your desire to stay the same. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
quotes.author: Anon.

quotes.text: All great changes are preceded by chaos.
quotes.author: Anon.

quotes.text: Don’t make a change too complicated, just begin. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Small changes eventually add up to huge results. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You can’t change what’s going on around you until you start changing what’s going on within you.
quotes.author: Anon.

quotes.text: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.author: Lily Leung

quotes.text: I have accepted fear as part of life — specifically the fear of change… I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says, ‘turn back.’
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.text: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.  Rumi
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Continuity gives us roots; change gives us branches, letting us stretch and grow and reach new heights.
quotes.author: Pauline R. Kezer

quotes.text: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: All love shifts and changes. I don’t know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time. Julie
quotes.author: Andrews

quotes.text: Things don’t have to change the world to be important.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: There is change in all things. You yourself are subject to continual change and some decay and this is common to the entire universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Things do not change; we change.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Any change, even a change for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.text: Turbulence is a life force. It is an opportunity. Let’s love turbulence and use it for change.
quotes.author: Ramsey Clark

quotes.text: Every day the clock resets. Your wins don’t matter. Your failures don’t matter. Don’t stress on what was, fight for what could be.
quotes.author: Sean Higgins

quotes.text: One child, one teacher, one pen, and one book can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Readjusting is a painful process, but most of us need it at one time or another. Arthur Chirstopher
quotes.author: Benson

quotes.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
quotes.author: Karen Kaiser Clark

quotes.text: Everything passes; everything wears out; everything breaks.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: Play to your strengths. If you aren’t great at something, do more of what you’re great at.
quotes.author: Jason Lemkin

quotes.text: If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. If you can’t walk, then crawl. But whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King. Jr.

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Just take any step, whether small or large. And then another and repeat day after day. It may take months, maybe years, but the path to success will become clear.
quotes.author: Aaron Ross

quotes.text: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.text: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.text: The changes we dread most may contain our salvation.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.text: And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.text: One day or day one. You decide. Anon.
quotes.author: Happiness is the art of making a bouquet of those flowers within reach. Anon.

quotes.text: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.  J. Robert
quotes.author: Oppenheimer

quotes.text: True happiness is not attained through self -gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: If being happy is important to you, try this instead of regretting all you lack, celebrate all you’ve got.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.text: Man wishes to be happy even when he lives so as to make happiness impossible. Augustine
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.text: Being happy doesn’t depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Remember, happiness doesn’t depend upon who you are or what you have, it depends solely upon what you think.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: It isn't what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about it.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Happiness is not the end of life; character is.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: A man may be satisfied but not sanctified, contented but not converted, happy but not holy.
quotes.author: John Blanchard

quotes.text: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: You will never be happy if you continue to search for happiness. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.text: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.  James Matthew
quotes.author: Barrie

quotes.text: A happy life depends on a good conscience.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.text: Happiness is the secret to all beauty. There is no beauty without happiness.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Happiness is not the absence of problems; but the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Jack Brown

quotes.text: Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy or strong.
quotes.author: The amount of work is the same.  Francesca Reigler

quotes.text: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
quotes.author: Treya Stark

quotes.text: The secret of happiness is renunciation.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.text: He who forgets the language of gratitude can never be on speaking terms with happiness.
quotes.author: C. Neil Strait

quotes.text: Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: If you find serenity and happiness, some may be jealous. Be happy anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: In order to live free and happily, you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy sacrifice.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Happiness can be built only on virtue, and must of necessity have truth for its foundation.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.text: A happy man is he that knows the world and cares not for it.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.text: Until you make peace with who you are, you’ll never be content with what you have.
quotes.author: Doris Mortman

quotes.text: The sexiest curve on your body is your smile. Flaunt it! Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Happiness comes in waves. It’ll find you again.
quotes.author: Anon.

quotes.text: When you love what you have, you have everything you need. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: When it rains, look for rainbows. When it’s dark, look for stars. Anon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: Wise men and women in every major culture have maintained that the secret of happiness is not in getting more but in wanting less.
quotes.author: Philip Slater

quotes.text: The joyfulness of a man prolongeth his days. Proverbs 10:27
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Happy is he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.text: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.text: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you’re climbing it.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.text: A good laugh makes any interview, or any conversation, so much better.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.text: A calm and modest life brings more happiness than the pursuit of success combined with constant restlessness.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass…get up, get up, get up!! Happiness is not the absence of problems. It’s the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Happiness is different from pleasure. Happiness has something to do with struggling, enduring, and accomplishing.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.text: When a man has lost all happiness, he’s not alive. Call him a breathing corpse. Sophocles
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Action may not bring happiness but there is no happiness without action.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: There's nothing like deep breaths after laughing that hard. Nothing in the world like a sore stomach for the right reasons.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.text: If you start to think the problem is ‘out there,’ stop yourself. That thought is the problem.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers’ gardens.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.text: Happiness is a risk. If you’re not a little scared, then you’re not doing it right.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison

quotes.text: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The thing everyone should realize is that the key to happiness is being happy by yourself and for yourself.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are, and not who people think you are.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.text: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: True happiness ne’er entered at an eye; true happiness resides in things unseen.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.text: It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: Happiness is a state of mind. It's just according to the way you look at things.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Trying to be happy without giving to others is like trying to kiss alone.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.text: Whether you are talking about education, career, or service, you are talking about life. And life must really have joy. It’s supposed to be fun.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.text: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: There you go… let it all slide out. Unhappiness can’t stick in a person’s soul when it’s slick with tears.
quotes.author: Shannon Hale

quotes.text: Be happy with what you have. Be excited about what you want.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.text: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.text: The myriad things are complete in us. There is no greater joy than to reflect on ourselves and become sincere.  Mencius
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Happiness does not depend on the actual number of blessings we manage to scratch from life, but on our attitude towards them.
quotes.author: Alexandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.text: People are unhappy when they get something too easily. You have to sweat – that’s the only moral they know.
quotes.author: Dany Laferrière

quotes.text: Seek for happiness and you will never find it. Seek righteousness and you will discover you are happy. It will be there without your knowing it, without your seeking it.
quotes.author: D. Martyn Lloyd -Jones

quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better to take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you say are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.text: If one speaks or acts with a pure mind, happiness follows like a shadow. Buddha
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It is a barren life that holds only happiness.
quotes.author: Frances J. Roberts

quotes.text: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
quotes.author: Margaret B. Runbeck

quotes.text: Some people cause happiness wherever they go, others whenever they go.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The pursuit of happiness… is the greatest feat man has to accomplish.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.text: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one’s values.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Embrace the glorious mess that you are.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.text: If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: The only thing that will make you happy is being happy with who you are.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.text: Life’s biggest moments seem really short but the great thing is the memory of that moment lasts forever.
quotes.author: Jeremiah Say

quotes.text: Happiness is not having what you want. It is appreciating what you have.
quotes.author: Jeremiah Say

quotes.text: Happiness is not a goal… it’s a by -product of a life well lived.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life — to be happy. It's all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: Nobody really cares if you’re miserable, so you might as well be happy.
quotes.author: Cynthia Nelms

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Do not watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.text: We don’t make movies to make money, we make money to make more movies.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My unmatched perspicacity coupled with my sheer indefatigability makes me a feared opponent in any realm of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Andrew Tate
